Black Soil.description: Volcanic soil found in Maharashtra, MP, Gujarat. Rich in clay and moisture retention.
regeneration_tips: Rotate with pulses to fix nitrogen

Alluvial Soil.description: Fertile soil found in Indo-Gangetic plains. Best for diverse crops.

Red Soil.description: Common in Tamil Nadu, Karnataka, Odisha. Low nitrogen and humus.

Laterite Soil.description: Found in Kerala, Karnataka hills; acidic and rich in iron.
regeneration_tips: Plant cover crops to prevent erosion

Desert Soil.description: Sandy soil found in Rajasthan; low moisture retention.
regeneration_tips: Add biochar to improve moisture retention
